prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon that has a unique color pattern and large expressive eyes.
I want a small, adorable Pokemon with a rounded body and tiny legs, perfect for the forest.
Generate a whimsical Pokemon design that features shades of blue and yellow with cute antennae.
Make a Pokemon that embodies curiosity and playfulness, with vibrant colors and a friendly expression.
Imagine a tiny insectoid Pokemon that blends in with the grass, showcasing its vibrant colors.
Design a Pokemon with a quirky appearance, emphasizing its big eyes and small stature.
Show me a bug Pokemon with a playful personality that is often found in urban environments.
